question: Which among the following acts was introduced during the time of the Great Revolt of 1857?
option3: The Press and Books Registration Act 1867
explanation: Act XV was introduced during the time of the Great Revolt of 1857. Its main objective was to control the setting up of print presses and to limit in specific cases the flow of printed books and papers. These limitations were of an impermanent sort and were withdrawn right after the Mutiny.
